title: bed room - RIAD AZRUR
desc:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at RIAD AZRUR! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Located in Marrakesh, a 5-minute walk from The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech and 600 yards from the center, RIAD AZRUR has air-conditioned accommodations with free Wifi, and a terrace.

There's a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, a hair dryer and free toiletries.

The bed and breakfast offers a continental or American breakfast. At RIAD AZRUR you'll find a restaurant serving Moroccan cuisine.

At the accommodation guests are welcome to use spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services.

title: Bed room 01 - Amber Design Residence
desc: Many of Krakow’s cultural attractions, including St Mary’s Basilica and the Cloth Hall, are within 1640 feet of the accommodations. Krakow Main Station is also only a 6-minute walk away.
